response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item, but a solution designed to enhance your daily experience. Considering its craftsmanship and unique features, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, we're offering this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $200. This is an opportunity to own something truly special at a price that reflects its true worth. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this offer.", "product_price": 200}
